documents.document: but on the plus side I've got endless hours to play them!
Kinda regretting dropping money on these now that I'm unemployed...again... https://t.co/sB4XT3mgry
@joss hey man, are you busy for the next few months or?? https://t.co/24TMqMI9jc
@garrettkidney Although you could point to Deadpool's popularity and the loose continuity of X-Men.
@garrettkidney definitely, wonder if people would be interested in standalone films though given everything is a universe these days.
@garrettkidney it'll be interesting to see whether it limps on after WW & JL or some sort of reboot down the line.
@garrettkidney when a Batman who literally murders a guy with a giant crate is still more heroic than your Superman you've got problems.
@garrettkidney his version of fun is Jimmy Olsen being shot ffs.
@garrettkidney they're all so unlikeable, just grim, cynical characters. The whole "dark and edgy" trend went out with Nolan's trilogy.
@BenAffleck let me have the gig man, I'll even do it for half of whatever WB are paying.
@garrettkidney how Snyder kept his position (and even expanded it!) after MoS & BvS is insane.
@garrettkidney it's head scratching how wrong they've got it at every turn so far. Tbf Warner Bros. are a mess in general a long time now.
lol at some people trying to spin this into a positive for DC/WB, it's a disaster plain and simple.
Is there anyone genuinely surprised? If Justice League bombs I doubt Affleck will even stay on as the character. https://t.co/MgBSu8ZekA
@BohsJohnny never really checked out the promotion until recently, seems like good craic. And the tag league sounded great
@BohsJohnny yeah I was looking forward to hearing Alan call it, hopefully FloSlam get some more shows uploaded soon.
@williambr0wn tears. https://t.co/ZnEbj92Vgb
Talk about having everything down to a tee Shinsuke was made for TV.
Going ***** on the entrances alone. My word.
Same for Nakamura too. Hope this delivers as well as I've heard.
He has everything down in NXT, just needs to produce another level of match consistently.
Roode looks a million dollars with this entrance.
Right on to Roode/Nakamura now. That video package for it was next level class.
Whats the deal with WXW's commentary btw? We've got one Daniel Bryan sounding motherfucker having a full on interview with himself.
Checking out WXW, would've thought FloSlam had more shows. Wanted to see this Walter lad in a singles. https://t.co/Vwx2hxdMkR
Can't wait to use this for the irl Valentines. https://t.co/a6NvxUxkIg
[Valentine] @CarlosVanSRon's Valentine should be @garrettkidney! Who should be yours? via https://t.co/WvNzag5WVS https://t.co/6kmEgmPBO0
*takes a big gulp from my Smark Tears mug* https://t.co/Jtx2XjVB3f
@WrestleSubtitle Can't wait for the meltdown online my friend.
@WrestleSubtitle Taker can call it, doesn't necessarily have to physically lead things. The finish will be interesting.
@WrestleSubtitle fair point, although he's in better shape than he was. All Taker needs to do is signature stuff, Reigns will do the rest.
@WrestleSubtitle and if it's Taker last outing he'll do everything to make it worthwhile.
@WrestleSubtitle tbf he hasn't had a great opponent since Punk, WM 30 was a write off too. Reigns always delivers in big matches.
@WrestleSubtitle Wyatt will go in as champion.
@WrestleSubtitle I disagree both should deliver big time although I'd have rather it was Reigns/Strowman & Taker/Cena.
The possibility of Jeff Cobb vs Pete Dunne. My word. https://t.co/ZBQEwmQjsr
@Mayafacetico yes! I always liked the WM21 match tbh.
@Mayafacetico pissy in what sense?
What a time to be alive, everything is so very bad but the wrestling...the wrestling is good.
I'd still probably go with Dunne/Bate or Hero/Sabre as my favourite of the month.
@Mayafacetico yeah I'd take Flair by for the first half but the latter wins might go with Cena. He's had some amazing defences.
Has anyone written anything yet comparing Cena & Flair's respective 16 wins/reigns?
@Mayafacetico really gives them a big fight feel around the matches each time, essentially wrestling meets Star Wars.
Even the tweets I've seen like "It sucks, but I have to admit..." no mate it doesn't suck but thanks for recognising Big John as the GOAT.
The best part was seeing the divided reaction when Cena came out to winning the whole place over at the end.

I still can't get over how good Cena/Styles III* was. A great month of wrestling.
*I love giving these things titles btw, hyped for part IV
@Oli_Row plus I'd be all in for Reigns/Lesnar II tbh.
@Oli_Row , can't wait to see the reaction if Reigns does retire Taker at WM.
@Oli_Row not necessarily a bad way to go provided they go with the Reigns we saw last night
@Oli_Row rn I reckon the potential Summerslam title match is Lesnar/Reigns.
@Oli_Row Not looking forward to going back to Dark Souls Boss Level Lesnar though.
@Oli_Row if it shakes up their main event scene or makes it exciting at least it's not all bad.
@Oli_Row suppose it gives a reason to make it the main event.
@Oli_Row apart from a potential Reigns/Strowman or Reigns/Taker match. Goldberg/Lesnar should've fun but I don't get why it needs the title.
Hope this dude is alright, that was a nasty elimination bump. https://t.co/ezNzMggapH
@glasgowkjh @allan_cheapshot tbf the star rating system escapes me in general.
@glasgowkjh @allan_cheapshot can I ask why people keep the 3/4 part of the rating? Seems so small as to not really matter when rating stuff.
Facist Hulk Hogan. https://t.co/vzPfmtsWVn
Ok wait it was probably Cena's lariats or Harper turning on Wyatt tbh but still up there.
Y'know what was probably my favourite part of the weekend graps? Seeing a lot of good brothers and sisters just having a great time.
@nrdbrennan apparently they're going with Orton/Wyatt at WM so that leaves the door open to do Cena/Styles IV.
@nrdbrennan Styles/Cena was a Wrestlemania level match, really hope they do a rematch.
@nrdbrennan you're not alone there lots of people loved the Rumble match. Some of it worked, some of it didn't for me.
@GolazoDan Orton/Wyatt is the likely end point. Cena dropping it at EC next month.
You can point at the sign all night Randall you know damn well that main event spot is going to Lesnar & Goldberg.
TEARS.
LMAO what a waste of a spot.
The ring is filling up for some serious bodying to go on when one of these three enter.
Big John will see you in the G1 next summer Kaz mate. https://t.co/Y0UxgCV2N2
Can't believe we've still got Lesnar, Goldberg & Taker to come in.
It was served.
Breakfast is about to be served lads.
Jimmy Dream? More like Jimmy Dead. Holy shit.
LMAO they've booked a logical Rumble for once.
Ohhh yes it's a hoss down.
They should take an intermission halfway and hold a raffle. The annual Royal Rumble Raffle.
"The following contest is... the Royal Rumble match!" https://t.co/IIoDHiB9Vz
So I'm thinking either Undertaker or Miz winning the Rumble and facing Cena at Mania? Can't see him dropping the belt at Elimination Chamber
Why is Westworld the next Smackdown PPV??
That genuinely felt Wrestlemania level. Can't believe they didn't decide on it closing the show in Orlando.
Murder if we don't get the Greatest Of All Time vs the Greatest Ever in 2017.
Tears @ Little Naitch congratulating John on equaling his record.
HOLY SHIT CENA WENT FULL CHRIS HERO WITH THAT FINISH.
LOVE BIG JOHN. LOVE AJ. LOVE THE WRESTLING.
Big John & Aj are working their own mini Wrestle Kingdom here.
Stream is ridiculously glitchy for this of all matches.
Going the full ****** already
Hope Cena/Styles goes a full hour.
@garrettkidney yes, I'm having to imagine all the cool moves here.
With Owens retaining as well I can't see a Raw Rumble winner tonight.
I'm all in for Reigns/Strowman at Wrestlemania.
Damn this stream is miles behind the rest of you.
What a bump.
Hell of a card so far for both shows.
If you pull Jericho down you get a free copy of whatever Fozzy album is out now.
So if Kev loses does Jericho have to stay up there? I hope so, and he enters the Rumble match while in the cage.
Thought they were going to recreate the Omega table bump there (but with chairs).
They've finally locked yer Da up https://t.co/VnZD69MRKY
@MatthewMacklin It's a ridiculous concept, hopefully it's ridiculously played out.
Reigns/Owens already? I don't get the point of the cage if it's a No DQ anyway. They've played the feud to death but this could deliver.
